tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE notifications (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  message_id INT,
  type VARCHAR(50),
  user_id INT,
  is_read BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    message_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(255),
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE friend_requests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    requester_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    status VARCHAR,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE updates (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    update_type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    message_id INT,
    friend_request_id INT,
    update_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE friend_requests (
    request_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(10),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE new_messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    message_content VARCHAR(255),
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE friend_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_user_id INT,
    to_user_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50),
    user_id INT,
    message_id INT,
    is_read BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
